entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:17 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 06:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
